subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Gorgui Dieng is tall and reserved. Russ Smith is nearly a foot shorter and brash. Together the sophomore roommates have helped Louisville climb into the national semifinals.
